properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
1. M/V MSC FLAMINIA ON FIRE AND NUMEROUS CONTAINERS
   ADRIFT IN 48-13N 027-59W. 22 PERSONS RECOVERED
   IN LIFERAFT. ONE PERSON REMAINS MISSING. CREWMAN
   WITH SERIOUS BURNS REQUIRING MEDICAL ASSISTANCE.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FALMOUTH,
   PHONE: 44 13 2631 7575, FAX: 44 13 2631 5610,
   E-MAIL: FALMOUTHCOASTGUARD@MCGA.GOV.UK.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1566/12.
